DOC.brief_title: LCS12 v Combined Oral Contraceptive ( COC ) User Satisfaction Study
DOC.criteria: Subject sign date Informed Consent Form ( ICF ) . The subject generally healthy , request contraception , 18 29 year age ( inclusive ) Screening . In opinion investigator , subject good health ; without uterine condition would preempt insertion LCS12 ; without conditions/history would contraindicate use oral contraceptive . Subject normal clinically insignificant cervical smear ( ie , one require follow ) . A cervical smear must take Screening Visit document normal result obtain within 6 month Screening . Subjects atypical squamous cell undetermined significance ( ASCUS ) include study Human Papilloma Virus ( HPV ) deoxyribonucleic acid ( DNA ) test , accord standard local laboratory , negative highrisk HPV . As determined subject 's history , subject regular ( ie , endogenous cyclicity without hormonal contraceptive use ) menstrual cycle ( length cycle 2135 day ) . Subject willing able attend schedule study visit comply study procedure . Pregnancy current lactation ( le 6 week since vaginal Cesarean delivery abortion ) . Note : Postpartum LCS12 insertion postpone uterus fully involuted , earlier 6 week delivery . If involution substantially delay , investigator consider wait 12 week postpartum . Infected abortion postpartum endometritis within 3 month prior Screening Visit ( Visit 1 ) Chronic , daily use drug may increase serum potassium level , nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs , eg . ibuprofen naproxen ) , potassiumsparing diuretic ( eg . spironolactone ) , potassium supplementation , angiotensin convert enzyme ( ACE ) inhibitor , angiotensinII receptor antagonist , aldosterone antagonist , heparin .
